name: The Three Stooges Digitally Remastered Collector's Edition
name_original: The Three Stooges Digitally Remastered Collector's Edition
description:
The Three Stooges Digitally Remastered Collector's Edition is an arcade game developed by Cinemaware and Oxygen Media. It was originally released in 2002. Blackstar Interactive published the game.
You can play The Three Stooges Digitally Remastered Collector's Edition on PC.
